modName: Moras Gift and Miraak Loot Improvement
summary: A small mod I made after seeing how awful Miraak\'s loot and how cool his sword\'s enchantment were. Enables the tentacle enchantment to be put on other weapons.
descriptionHtml:
A small mod I made after seeing how awful Miraak\'s loot and how cool his sword\'s enchantment were. 

Included in this mod: 
-UPDATED- 
1) Miraak (Mask) now increases magicka by 70, reduces shout cooldowns by 20% and reduces all spell costs by 50%. 
2) Miraak\'s Gloves now grant 20% cost reduction to Conjuration and Destruction magic schools. 
3) Miraak\'s Robe now also increases health and stamina by 62. 
4) Miraak\'s Sword now also leeches magicka and reduces movement speed of its victims, in addition to its original effect. 
5) Miraak\'s Robes is now Light Armor and the full set benefits from armor improvement perks Custom Fit and Matching Set. Every item in the set is also now upgradable and cost 1 Ebony Ingot and 1 Daedra Heart. 
6) Miraak\'s Boots makes the wearer muffled and able to walk on water. 

Bonus: 
1)Miraak\'s Sword is now disenchantable and the enchantment is called Mora\'s Gift. When applied on melee weapons, the tentacle animation carries over. 

UPDATE: I\'ve tested the animation with multiple enchants applied by the enchanting perk and it does work. 

2)Miraak\'s Staff now has more charge. 

I\'ve tested the mod and it works fine in my game and does not require a new save. If you have problems, please inform me on the comment section. The mod requires Dragonborn DLC and Skyrim 1.9 Patch. Enchants might feel underpowered, but I didn\'t want to become a god wearing the set and the sword. I might change them if needed. 

IMPORTANT: If enchantments do not work, reequip your items. That should fix it. 

v1.0 
-Released 

v1.1 
-Miraak now only drops Light Armor, Heavy Armor or Clothing versions of his mask, depending on which mod is installed.

v1.2 
-Fixed an issue with some parts of the set being allowed to be sold to clothing merchants and the rest to armor merchants. Now they can only be sold to armor merchants. 
-Increased the value of the armor set and the weapons to better reflect their value. 
-Clothing version released.

v1.3 
-The enchantments are upgraded. 

v1.4 
-The enchantments have changed upon request. 

steam link : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=141370737
author: Angry Muslim -Rokalm-
